Global CAD configuration¶

It is assumed that Office documents in the system, as depicted in the table below, are registered as the creating systems. Deviating configurations are not supported.

Configuration of the created systems¶

Designation of the created system

ZVS Zeichnung Endung (ZVS Drawing Suffix)

Description

Remark

MS Excel

 .xls

Excel 97-2003 workbook

Required

MS Excel:XLSX

 .xlsx

Excel workbook

Optional

MS Excel:XLSM

 .xlsm

Excel workbook with macros

Optional

MS Excel:XLSB

 .xlsb

Excel binary workbook

Optional

MS Outlook

 .msg

Outlook message format

Required

MS PowerPoint

 .ppt

PowerPoint 97-2003 presentation

Required

MS PowerPoint:PPTX

 .pptx

PowerPoint presentation

Optional

MS PowerPoint:PPTM

 .pptm

PowerPoint presentation with macros

Optional

MS Project

 .mpp Project

Required

MS Visio

 .vsd

Drawing

Required
MS-Visio:VSDX .vsdx

Drawing

Optional

MS Word

 .doc

Word 97-2003 document

Required

MS Word:DOCX

 .docx

Word document

Optional

MS Word:DOCM

 .docm

Word document with macros

Optional

Note

The components on the server side for using the Microsoft Office integration are already installed by installing the package cs.officelink.
